availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1859-1862

body.p: will you See the Goviner Mcgoffin & committee for arming the State & See if I can git a contract to furnish a Quantity of Salt-peter a Quantity of Powder I have plans of fine Locality for a Powder Mill Plenty of water Power and Plenty of caves to work 300 hands and could in a Short Time be mooving the business a hed Some one must have this contract & these is no one that I Know have the Same facilitis I have -- a Trusty Experianced man in the Mill is all I Should be Lacking to go right on with the Business I am writing to old friend Swagart on the Same Subject See what you can do for Me
